\begin{center}
Here is a list of some projects I began :
\end{center}

- Research Portfolio tutorial (ongoing) : 
This is a simple tutorial about online portfolio creation for research students, using GitHub and Quarto. 

- [Macroeconomics Group Presentation about a Behavioral New Keynesian Model](/Macroeconomics-2-Presentation) (finished) : 
This was a group presentation done in the spring semester of 2024 for a Macroeconomics 2 class that consisted in an article review of "A Behavioral New Keynesian Model", by Xavier Gabaix (2020). We received a grade of 18 over 20 for this presentation.

- [Microeconomics Group project about modelling pollution tax in a Game Theoretical Framework](/Micro_project) (finished) : 
This was a group project done in the spring semester of 2024 for a Microeconomics 2 class that consisted in the use of notions seen in class on a chosen case. We choose to do it on strategic interactions between firms and government in a context of pollution tax. We still didn't receive our grade.

- [Webgraph : an attempt to create an R package to make graph visualiation with webscrapping easier on R](/Webgraph) (dead) : 
This was a personal project began in the spring semester of 2024, after being introduced how to create an R library in a introductory class of programming.
